:py:mod:`napi.data.layout`
==========================

.. py:module:: napi.data.layout

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Model classes to represent dataset and layouts.



Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   napi.data.layout.Dataset
   napi.data.layout.Layout




.. py:class:: Dataset

   Representation of the complete dataset.

   .. py:method:: get()

      Query the dataset.



.. py:class:: Layout

   Representation of the file layout in the directory.

   .. py:method:: index()

      Run indexer over the layout.
